metadata.title: CVE-2024-50259 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  netdevsim: Add trailing zero to terminate the string in nsim_nexthop_bucket_activity_write()  This was found by a static analyzer. We should not forget the trailing zero after copy_from_user() if we will further do some string operations, sscanf() in this case. Adding a trailing zero will ensure that the function performs properly.
